snippet: A gunman killed at least one person and wounded two others in a hospital building in Reno, Nev., before turning the gun on himself, the police said.
abstract: Gunman opens fire at hospital in Reno, Nev, killing one person and wounding two others before killing himself.
lead_paragraph: A gunman killed at least one person and wounded two others in a hospital building in Reno, Nev., before turning the gun on himself, the police said.

headline.main: Gunman at Reno Hospital Kills One and Wounds Two
headline.print_headline: Gunman at Reno Hospital Kills One and Wounds Two
